definition: golden cudgel, weapon wielded by Sun Wukong in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
hoop/to bind with hoops
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: Did you return the staff to rightful owner?
sentences.chinese: 你把金箍棒物歸原主了麼？

sentences.english: He had a magic golden cudgel and tremendously supernatural power.
sentences.chinese: 他擁有一根神奇的金箍棒和高強的武功。

sentences.english: Do not think you like the golden cudgel like a long Ah, I'm afraid of you.
sentences.chinese: 別以爲你丫長的像金箍棒似的，我就怕你了。
